RelatedSentence: LONDON , Ontario -- The U.S. Army Tank and Automotive Command 's Life Cycle Management Command has awarded a 56.8 million Canadian dollar ( $ 52.3 million ) contract modification to General Dynamics Land Systems - Canada to develop upgrades in support of the U.S. Marine Corps Light Armored Vehicle ( LAV ) Mobility and Obsolescence Upgrade and Integration Program , the company announced in a May 19 release .

LONDON , Ontario -- The U.S. Army Tank and Automotive Command 's Life Cycle Management Command has awarded a 56.8 million Canadian dollar ( $ 52.3 million ) contract modification to General Dynamics Land Systems - Canada to develop upgrades in support of the U.S. Marine Corps Light Armored Vehicle ( LAV ) Mobility and Obsolescence Upgrade and Integration Program , the company announced in a May 19 release .
